message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I think you'll find it's a game-changer. I'm willing to start with an offer of $900000 for the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price of $900000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to the value you place on the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $950000.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I need to stick to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800000. This still leaves me within my financial limits while also acknowledging the value you see in the product.
